argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | resqrcld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | resqrcld.2 | |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) |
| 3 |  | #P_sqrtsq | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) -> ( sqrt ` ( A ^ 2 ) ) = A ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( sqrt ` ( A ^ 2 ) ) = A ) |
